entity.name: Ajay Kidave
entity.description: I am working on making it easier for developers and teams to build and deploy their applications securely. I am working on OpenRun which allows declarative GitOps deployment to a single machine or onto Kubernetes.

projects.name: OpenRun
projects.description: Open source alternative to Google Cloud Run and AWS App Runner. OpenRun supports declarative GitOps based blue-green deployment, OAuth/OIDC/SAML access controls, TLS certs & secrets management. OpenRun is built for teams to easily web apps, especially internal tools. App can be deployed directly to Docker/Podman or to Kubernetes.
